de.esoco.lib.comm

Class CommunicationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • de.esoco.lib.comm.CommunicationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CommunicationException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    The base class for all exceptions that can occur in the communications framework. It is derived from RuntimeException because errors can occur during all communication phases and should therefore always be expected.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
